description:
A pack of additional music tracks to use with Theatrhythm Final Bar Line.

♪THEATRHYTHM FBL CHRONO Pack (6 tracks)
Wings That Cross Time
Radical Dreamers -Le Trésor Interdit-
Chrono Trigger
Boss Battle 2
Battle with Magus
Corridors of Time

*Full game editions and Season Passes that include this product is also available. Please be careful to avoid making duplicate purchases.

*The full version of the game (sold separately) is required to make use of this content. Make sure to update the game before use in situations where the latest patch is required.

*An internet connection is required to obtain the music track packs.
name: THEATRHYTHM FBL CHRONO Pack
